pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generalized Competing Event Model // Generalized competing event model based on Cox PH model and Fine-Gray model. This function is designed to develop optimized risk-stratification methods for competing risks data, such as described in: 1. Carmona R, Gulaya S, Murphy JD, Rose BS, Wu J, Noticewala S,McHale MT, Yashar CM, Vaida F, and Mell LK (2014) DOI:10.1016/j.ijrobp.2014.03.047. 2. Carmona R, Zakeri K, Green G, Hwang L, Gulaya S, Xu B, Verma R, Williamson CW, Triplett DP, Rose BS, Shen H, Vaida F, Murphy JD, and Mell LK (2016) DOI:10.1200/JCO.2015.65.0739. 3. Lunn, Mary, and Don McNeil (1995) DOI:10.2307/2532940.
